mapper.select: SELECT count(*) as count FROM jnl10_acnt WHERE 1=1

SELECT jnl10_acnt_cd as jnl10AcntCd, /**계정코드*/ jnl10_acnt_nm as jnl10AcntNm, /**계정명*/ jnl10_parent_cd as jnl10ParentCd, /**상위계정코드*/ (select jnl10_acnt_nm from edu.jnl10_acnt where jnl10_acnt_cd = A.jnl10_parent_cd ) as jnl10ParentNm, jnl10_acnt_attr_cd as jnl10AcntAttrCd, /**계정속성(acntattrcode)*/ ( SELECT com02_code_nm /** 코드명*/ FROM com02_code WHERE 1=1 AND com02_com_cd = 'AcntAttrCode' AND com02_dtl_cd = A.jnl10_acnt_attr_cd AND COALESCE(com02_use_yn,'false') = 'true' ) as jnl10AcntAttrNm, jnl10_drcr_type as jnl10DrcrType, /**차대구분(drcrtype)*/ ( SELECT com02_code_nm /** 코드명*/ FROM com02_code WHERE 1=1 AND com02_com_cd = 'DrcrType' AND com02_dtl_cd = A.jnl10_drcr_type AND COALESCE(com02_use_yn,'false') = 'true' ) as jnl10DrcrTypeNm, jnl10_slip_yn as jnl10SlipYn, /**전표생성여부*/ jnl10_use_yn as jnl10UseYn /**사용여부*/ FROM jnl10_acnt A WHERE 1=1
AND jnl10_acnt_cd = #{jnl10AcntCd}

AND jnl10_acnt_cd = #{jnl10AcntCd}
